_header: O blessed Alban O martyr most benign
_description: Hymn to St. Alban — five stanzas rhyme royal

CamFitz40-1950.First Lines:
O blessid Albone o Martir moste benygneCallid of Bretayne Steward
                    moste notable…
CamFitz40-1950.Last Lines:
…Callid kynge Offa Which had a vysiounWhere thou were buried
                    in Brutys Albioun
